title.rendered: Can I buy NFTs on eBay or Amazon?

content.rendered:
Everything related to cryptocurrencies is not new to most today, but it is true that over time new digital goods appear to trade. It seems that for some time now, the ones known as NFT or Non Fungible Tokens are monopolizing much of the attention online. Much of the blame for this lies with famous people or certain companies that are betting on these elements of digital commerce.

Lately we have been able to see how certain celebrities begin to sell content of these characteristics through the internet. At the same time, some large companies, for example, those related to the world of video game, are also betting on these goods. Of course, although at first all this may seem like a game, we cannot confuse it. Moreover, there are certain titles in the form of gaming software that we can use to trade with these NFT.

For all this that we are telling you, it is easy to imagine that we have a good number of specialized channels and portals for acquire these digital goods. But at the same time there are users who wonder about the possibility of getting some through the most popular e-commerce websites. A clear example of all this can be found, for example, in the well-known eBay or Amazon that most have used at some point.

eBay, Amazon and trading with NFTs

Well, for all those who have considered this possibility over the last few months, to say that the retail giant amazon has not yet made the determination to enter the world of NFTs. However, quite the opposite, we can say about the best-known online auction portal out there, eBay. It is true that at this time the interest aroused by these digital goods is not what was expected by those who bet on all of it.

However, despite all the popular auction portal he has recently made up his mind to try to get in there and bet on these digital tokens. We tell you this because eBay is looking for a way to enter the world of NFTs. Hence, a few days ago it presented a collection of tokens with 3D animations. Here you can see iconic athletes in motion captured from the covers of Sports Illustrated magazine. An example of this is found in the first of these releases.

In it I could see the Canadian hockey athlete, Wayne Gretzky, performing some of his most popular moves. Thus, it includes thirteen limited edition digital collectibles that contains 299 NFTs. This type of movement related to digital goods, eBay It plans to carry them out over the next few months until the end of the year. You will be able to see new animated images of the covers of Sports Illustrated and so they will try to enter this complex NFT market, we will see the success of all this.
